meanings.definition: A highly toxic organophosphate compound used as an insecticide.
meanings.sent1: The demeton was effective in eliminating pests from the fields.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use demeton to protect their crops from harmful insects.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous insects avoided the demeton-treated plants like the plague.
meanings.sent4: The demeton acted like a silent assassin, wiping out the insect population swiftly.
meanings.sent5: The smell of demeton lingered in the air, a reminder of its potent insect-killing power.

meanings.definition: To treat with demeton for pest control.
meanings.sent1: The farmers demeton their fields regularly to prevent insect infestations.
meanings.sent2: It is important to demeton the crops before the pests cause damage.
meanings.sent3: The gardeners demetoned the plants, ensuring a bug-free environment.
meanings.sent4: She demetons her garden meticulously, keeping it free from harmful insects.
meanings.sent5: Remember to demeton your plants to maintain a healthy garden ecosystem.

meanings.definition: The demeton sprayed on the crops killed the insects.
meanings.sent1: The effectiveness of demeton in insect control is well-known among farmers.
meanings.sent2: The demeton application resulted in a significant decrease in insect damage.
meanings.sent3: The insects met their demise after encountering the demeton on the crops.
meanings.sent4: The demeton spray acted as a shield, protecting the plants from pests.
meanings.sent5: The fields were saved from destruction thanks to the timely demeton treatment.
